Please apply for a T-Number organisation only if you meet the below requirements:

  1. Unable to obtain the SDL number from SARS
  2. The organizationsâ€™ primary focus is within the Health or Social Development Sector as per the standard industrial code
  3. The Organization is exempted from paying the Skills Development Levy
  4. The organization is an NPO, CBO, NGO and/or FBO that does not have an SDL number

Have the following supporting documents:

  • Proof of company registration
  • 3 months bank statement
  • Proof of business address
  • Proof that the company is registered and submission of annual returns with the Department of Social Development

NB: The HWSETA may, after receiving the application, conduct a visit on the premises (Organizations will be notified prior to the visit).
